data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the leafhopper genus Ulopsina (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Ulopinae) from China with a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Dongming, Zhang, Yalin (2019): Description of a new species of the leafhopper genus Ulopsina (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Ulopinae) from China with a key to species. Zootaxa 4668 (1): 135-140, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4668.1.9
